data.text: The hotel staff were very accommodating to our dietary needs, the head chef Kadri was very nice and friendly. The hotel staff were so friendly and gave us amazing advice. The food was exceedingly good as well. The location was beautiful with our own private beach - the only hotel with a sea and mountainous view. Definitely a hotel to book when visiting Sharm-el-Sheikh!
data.title: Amazing stay, amazing food and friendly staff!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for your review.

We are thrilled to hear that our team was able to accommodate your dietary needs and that you found the service provided by our head chef, Kadri, to be both friendly and exceptional. It's delightful to know that our unique location with its private beach and the stunning views of the sea and mountains made your stay even more memorable. 
Your kind words about the quality of our food and the helpful advice from our staff are greatly appreciated, and they serve as a testament to our commitment to excellence.

We hope to welcome you back in the future. 
Best wishes,

Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
Just returned from having a relaxing week at this hotel
Could not fault the room, very spacious and it was cleaned every day
The food was delicious, excellent menu, lots to choose from
All the staff were extremely polite and helpful 
The hotel is directly on its own beach which was a delight
The pools were gorgeous and cleaned regularly 
Would we return to this hotel? Yes we will be next year, next time we will book a room with its own private pool
Gorgeous vacation with fabulous weather
data.title: Relaxing, fabulous time

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Debbie,
We appreciate that you took the time to share your experience with us.

It is delightful to know that you found the spaciousness and cleanliness of our rooms to your satisfaction. Our housekeeping team works diligently to ensure that each guest has a comfortable and clean environment during their visit. 
Your compliments on the delicious food and the variety offered on our menu are genuinely appreciated, as our culinary team strives to provide a memorable dining experience for every palate. 
The politeness and helpfulness of our staff are pillars of the Barceló Tiran Sharm experience, and we are glad that their service contributed positively to your stay.
We are also elated that you enjoyed the exclusive access to our private beach, where the beauty of the Nabq coast can be fully appreciated. Our pools are indeed a highlight for many of our guests, and we take great pride in maintaining them to the highest standards for your enjoyment.
Knowing that you plan to return, especially to experience our rooms with a private pool, fills us with joy and anticipation to welcome you back.

Best regards,

Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
The warm pool is closed at 10 pm, yet they turn it off much earlier than that and the water is cold. Very very bad food quality, didnt like the service and they allow people to go around and sell stuff and that is pretty annoying. Mosquitos in the rooms, in the reception and everywhere and they dont do anything about it. Bad safety and hygiene, they would spray anti flies that are posiones and dont care about ur safety and health. Not worth the money at all. The place look perfect in pictures but it is a big scammmmm!!! The beach is not sandy, it is big salt sand that hurts the feet. Dont wast ur money!! The food is very bad! We had “All inclusive” only to get snacks that are cheese sandwiches and they dont change anything, no other snacks, they reuse the old food!!! Very bad quality.
Mosquites everywhere, when i asked them to do something about it, they came and spray anti flies all over the room while we are in there, had to change the room and asked for something electric to have in the room, they said that we would get it the day after, didnt get anything!!!!!

Poor animation team, nothing interesting, they dont invite people and mostly interested in russian people only.

The food quality is very poor. No taste, overcooked, very bad quality and cold food.
data.title: Big scam!!! Dont wast your money

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Martina,

We appreciate that you took the time to share your experience with us.

In regards to the quality of the cuisine, our team is committed to offering a wide variety of options to cater to different palates, and we are saddened to learn it fell short for you. We offer chicken, duck, turkey, lamb, veal, meat, fish and seafood prepared in various ways for lunch and dinner, pasta and pizza stations as well as fresh fruit and vegetables are available every day at the main restaurant.
The restaurant on the beach offers guests several types of pizza, burgers, shawarma, spaghetti, Greek salad, Caesar salad. We are very upset and apologize to you that we were not able to satisfy and delight you from this range of food products and dishes. We are surprised to read that food has no taste. Trying to please many guests with different taste preferences, we decided that you can diversify the taste yourself by adding salt, pepper and other spices or sauces, which are presented in the Restaurant. 

We would like to take this opportunity to clarify that as part of our commitment to maintaining the highest standards of cleanliness and safety, our swimming pools undergo a thorough disinfection process in the evenings. This measure ensures the health and well-being of all our guests. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding.

We understand that uninvited vendors can be disruptive, and we are looking into this matter to ensure our guests' relaxation is not disturbed. For a future occasion, please, take a red flag at a towel station and no one at the beach will disturb you.

The presence of mosquitoes is a challenge we are continually addressing, and we apologize for any discomfort caused. Please rest assured that we adhere to strict health and safety protocols.

We regret that the beach did not meet your expectations; we are fortunate to have a unique coastal location that we hope can be appreciated in its natural beauty. 

Lastly, we regret to hear that our entertainment did not live up to your expectations and seemed to lack inclusivity. The team works tirelessly every day to keep our guests entertained by preparing shows and activities that appeal to our guests of all ages and nationalities which is quite a difficult task and they really are a valued asset of our hotel, we deeply regret reading that their efforts have not been appreciated.   

Best regards,

Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Went on a solo trip to this hotel, it was amazing. From the food, to the views from my balcony, to the brilliant animation team who were very funny, entertaining and friendly. I highly recommend this hotel, the chefs Ahmed and Mo were 10/10 - they would make pasta and pizza to your request. Genuinely no complaints and I will be returning with family later on in the year.
data.title: Brilliant experience - will be returning

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,
On behalf of the hotel management and the entire team, we would like to thank you for choosing Barcelo Tiran Sharm for your holiday and for taking the time to share your experience of your recent stay. Our goal is always to provide high quality services and we sincerely glad that you enjoyed the service provided to you as well as the view from the balcony. Thank you for your praising words about chefs and food at the restaurant, animation team. We promise that we will do our best to make your next visit to us as pleasant and memorable as the previous one.
Best regards,
Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Barceló Tiran Sharm

data.text:
My entire experience was a positive one and couldn't be more complimentary, with special thanks to the following for making my holiday such a wonderful one - 

Kadry, Mohamed, Ahmed, Hosny and Eslam. 

I would like to thank more if I had more space.
data.title: A wonderful peaceful holiday....

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.

A message of satisfaction from a recent guest is always a reward and incentive for us to continue upholding our high standards.

The entire team look forward to welcoming you back for a future visit.
Kind regards,

Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager
